Alexandria.East Glebe (Metroway station): East Glebe is a bus rapid transit station in Alexandria, Virginia, located on Jefferson Davis Highway between East Glebe Road and Hume Avenue. It is a stop on the portion of dedicated bus-only highway along the Metroway bus rapid transit line, providing two-way service along the route. The station provides service to the central Potomac Yard and Potomac communities in Alexandria.
